detail_desc: Sleeveless nursing tops in organic cotton jersey with a wrapover at the top and practical inner top for easier nursing access.

Relaxed-fit jeans in washed stretch denim with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, fake front pockets, real back pockets and narrow hems.

Set with a T-shirt in soft cotton jersey and pair of jeans in washed, superstretch, flexible denim for maximum mobility. Slim-fit jeans with an adjustable elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y), zip fly and button, fake front pockets, real back pockets and narrow hems. T-shirt with a print motif on the front and contrasting colour ribbing around the neckline.

Slim-fit jeans in washed superstretch, flexible denim for maximum mobility. Adjustable, elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y), zip fly and button, heart-shaped front pockets, regular back pockets and narrow hems.
V-neck jumpsuit in a patterned crêpe weave with narrow adjustable shoulder straps and a cut-out section and ties at the back. Elasticated seam at the waist, pleats at the front and side pockets.
Coat in a felted wool blend with narrow notch lapels, concealed buttons at the front, and welt side pockets. Lined.

Short, round-necked dress in an airy weave with beaded embroidery at the top and down the sleeves. Opening with a button at the back of the neck, 3/4-length sleeves with flounces at the cuffs, and a concealed zip in one side. Seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt with a flounce at the hem. Partly lined.
Off-the-shoulder blouse in stretch,textured cotton jersey with elastication at the top and short sleeves with a pompom trim. Hole embroidery and decorative lacing with tassels at the front.
Dungarees in washed stretch denim with hard-worn details, adjustable straps and press-studs at the sides. Chest pocket, side pockets, back pockets and slim legs.

Sleeveless dress in soft jersey with a glittery text print on the front, a braided detail at the top and an asymmetric, raw-edge hem.

Shirt in cotton poplin with a grandad collar, French front and yoke at the back. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and a rounded hem. Slim fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.
